rejection.details:
Since you started a petition the Government has announced that all schools and colleges will close to most students from this week: https://www.gov.uk/check-school-closure

The NHS has also put in place arrangements for people to get an "isolation note" where it is not possible to get a sick not from the doctor: https://111.nhs.uk/isolation-note/
